default: Click a segment of the chart to learn more about that crime category.
ASSAULT: Assault: Includes battery, robbery, weapons violation, homicide, and intimidation.
MINOR: Minor: Covers narcotics, burglary, prostitution, public peace violations, obscenity, public indecency, and arson.
NON STREET CRIME: Non Street Crime: Includes deceptive practices, trespass, child-related offenses, and domestic violence.
SEX OFFENSE: Sex Offense: Involves sexual assault, criminal sexual assault, kidnapping, and stalking.
THEFT: Theft: Ranges from theft to criminal damage and motor vehicle theft.
